changelog: Minor bug fixes in overlay display
update_info.update_message: A new version is available with exciting features and performance improvements. Please update your app for the best experience.

info_dialog.title: FF ToolsPro+
info_dialog.message:
Activate the Game Booster before playing for maximum performance.
Don't forget to try the latest features in the Overlay menu:

- Crosshair+
- Sensitivity & Resolution
- Boost Performance
- Headtrick Enhancer

To disable the overlay, long-press the minimize button.
Join our WhatsApp group: Click here
